text: Tekken is a fighting video game series made by Namco (now Bandai Namco Games). == Games == * Tekken - Arcade/PlayStation * Tekken 2 - Arcade/PlayStation * Tekken 3 - Arcade/PlayStation * Tekken Tag Tournament - Arcade/PlayStation 2 * Tekken Advance - GameBoy Advance * Tekken Card Challenge - WonderSwan * Tekken 4 - Arcade/PlayStation 2 * Death By Degrees - PlayStation 2 * Tekken 5 - Arcade/PlayStation2 * Tekken 5: Dark Resurrection - Arcade/PlayStation Portable/PlayStation 3 * Tekken 6 - Arcade/PlayStation 3/Xbox 360/PlayStation Portable * Tekken 6: Bloodline Rebellion - Arcade * Tekken Hybrid - PlayStation 3 * Tekken Tag Tournament 2 - PlayStation 3/Xbox 360/Wii U * Tekken Revolution - PlayStation 3 * Tekken 7 - Arcade/PlayStation 4/Xbox One/Microsoft Windows * Tekken 8 - Arcade/PlayStation 5/Xbox Series X/S/Microsoft Windows == Movies == * Tekken: The Motion Picture * Tekken (2010) * Tekken: Blood Vengeance * Tekken 2: Kazuya's Revenge == Others == * Urban Reign * Death by Degress * Capcom X Namco * Project X Zone * Project X Zone 2 * Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 2 ===Characters=== * Kazuya Mishima * Marshall Law * Paul Phoenix * Jin Kazama * Jun Kazama * Michelle Chang * King * Jack * Combot * Mokujin * Kuma and Panda * Ling Xiaoyu * Anna Williams Category:Tekken Category:Video games about terrorism
title: Tekken (series)
